verses.verse: Now Solomon<WH8010> the son<WH1121> of David<WH1732> established<WH2388> himself securely<WH2388> over<WH5921> his kingdom,<WH4438> and the Lord<WH3068> his God<WH430> [was] with him and exalted<WH1431> him greatly.<WH4605>

In that night<WH3915> God<WH430> appeared<WH7200> to Solomon<WH8010> and said<WH559> to him, "Ask<WH7592> what<WH4100> I shall give<WH5414> you."

And Solomon<WH8010> said<WH559> to God,<WH430> "Thou hast dealt<WH6213> with my father David<WH1> with great<WH1732> lovingkindness,<WH1419> and hast made<WH2617> me king<WH4427> in his place.<WH4427>

"Now,<WH6258> O Lord<WH3068> God,<WH430> Thy promise<WH1697> to my father David<WH1> is fulfilled;<WH1732> for Thou hast made<WH539> me king<WH4427> over<WH4427> a people<WH5921> as numerous<WH5971> as the dust<WH7227> of the earth.<WH6083>

"Give<WH5414> me now<WH6258> wisdom<WH2451> and knowledge,<WH4093> that I may go<WH3318> out and come<WH935> in before<WH6440> this<WH2088> people;<WH5971> for who<WH4310> can rule<WH8199> this<WH2088> great<WH1419> people<WH5971> of Thine?"

And God<WH430> said<WH559> to Solomon,<WH8010> "Because<WH3282> <WH834> you had<WH1961> this<WH2088> in mind,<WH3824> and did not ask<WH7592> for riches,<WH6239> wealth,<WH5233> or honor,<WH9202> or the life<WH5315> of those who hate<WH8130> you, nor<WH3808> have you even<WH1571> asked<WH7592> for long<WH7227> life,<WH3117> but you have asked<WH7592> for yourself wisdom<WH2451> and knowledge,<WH4093> that you may rule<WH8199> My people,<WH5971> over<WH5921> whom<WH834> I have made<WH4427> you king,<WH4427>

wisdom<WH2451> and knowledge<WH4093> have been granted<WH5414> to you. And I will give<WH5414> you riches<WH6239> and wealth<WH5233> and honor,<WH9202> such<WH834> <WH3651> as none<WH3808> of the kings<WH4428> who<WH834> were before<WH6440> you has possessed,<WH1961> <WH3651> nor<WH3808> those who will come after<WH310> you. "

And Solomon<WH8010> amassed<WH622> chariots<WH7393> and horsemen.<WH6571> He had<WH1961> 1400 chariots,<WH7393> and 12000 horsemen,<WH6571> and he stationed<WH5117> them in the chariot<WH7393> cities<WH5892> and with the king<WH4428> at Jerusalem.<WH3389>

And they imported<WH5927> <WH3318> chariots<WH4818> from Egypt<WH4714> for<WH600> [shekels] of silver<WH3701> apiece, and horses<WH5483> for<WH150> apiece, and by the same<WH3651> means<WH3651> <WH3027> they exported<WH3318> them to all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> of the Hittites<WH2850> and the kings<WH4428> of Aram.<WH758>
